Key Match Events: Bangladesh become the first team to be officially eliminated
Iftikhar Ahmed smashes 4 through the covers
Muhammad Rizwan cuts Mehidy Hasan away for another four
Pre-Game Insights: Pakistan need to win their next two matches to have a chance of finishing in the top four
Bangladesh captain Shakib Al Hasan thought the wicket was really good but they lost early wickets and couldn't build big partnerships
Post-Match Reflections: Pakistan captain Babar Azam congratulated the boys for the way they played in all three departments
Fakhar Zaman said after too many failures he was looking to score the first 30 runs and go from there
Steven Finn thought Pakistan had more impetus at the top of the order with Fahkar Zaman
Miscellaneous Highlights: Pakistan boosted their net run-rate with the manner in which they chased the total down
Bangladesh's miserable tournament has ended with them being the first team to be officially eliminated
